title: Ticket #6053: Fix problems with relative proxy paths in the blahp
description: When a blahp job has a gsi proxy, the blahp creates a symlink to the proxy under $(HOME)/.blah_jobproxy_dir/. This allows it to find the proxy for a subsequent BLAH_JOB_REFRESH_PROXY command. When the back-end scheduler is HTCondor, the blahp doesn't ensure that the symlinked filename is a full path.
remarks:
2016-Dec-16 14:59:08 by jfrey:
In the version of the blahp we build with the UW release of HTCondor, a submit command can fail if given a relative path to the job's proxy file. This happens if the blahp is configured to create a limited proxy based on the given one. Newer versions will construct the full path to the proxy file using the Iwd job attribute.

We can modify the gridmanager to always provide a full path to the proxy file in the submit command to the blahp.
